name: Forklift Training Simulation
summary: The Forklift Training Simulation offers a safe and controlled environment for new operators to learn the fundamentals of forklift maneuvering.   This VR program utilizes a single forklift model in an open space with crates,  allowing users to practice movement and control techniques without the risk of real-world accidents.   This serves as an ideal starting point for forklift training,  building a solid foundation for new operators before they transition to more complex tasks in a warehouse setting.
